website_summaries.verdict: This top-of-the-line model scans your home, vacuums your floors for up to 2 hours, then returns to its base for charging.
pros: Scans and maps your home so you can draw the exact area you want cleaned
Compatible with Alexa and Google Home, or you can control with an app
Unit returns to base to charge
cons: May not perform as well in larger homes

customer_reviews.title: Just Terrible
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this in September is worked very well and I was impressed. Then the company forces a firmware upgrade through the app and tell you that you need to switch apps to "Ecovacs Home". I did this and it absolutely ruined this robot. It gets stuck in the middle of the floor, gets tangled up in its own charging station, and can barely get out of the room that its charging base is in. I'm past the return date and product support window per Amazon. I paid 399 for this when I bought it off Amazon. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT you will be very disappointed and have an expensive brick.
customer_reviews.author: Jack T

customer_reviews.title: The app doesn’t work properly
customer_reviews.text: Deebot really needs to correct the app, it never holds the map of the house layout, and it mentioned in the description that it could spot clean or just clean a particular room, but with not keeping the map on the apps, you have to start all over and won’t give you the option. After five attempts, it had to be returned. It defeated the purpose. Another disappointment was the Deebot customer service call and email center, no one ever picked up & no return call from leaving a voicemail .
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Laser failure out of box
customer_reviews.text: For now, a 1-star review since mine seems to be defective out of the box. After a few minutes of running, the Deebot declared it had an "LDS Malfunction". The only "fix" for this malfunction is to "gently tap the Laser Distance Sensor", according to the Ecovacs app. Of course, that did not fix anything and the robot continues to complain about an LDS Malfunction and stopped working. I'm returning for refund. I may buy another and see if this one is just a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Grant

customer_reviews.title: Broke 1 month after purchase.  Got replacement, that one broke a few months later.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vacuum instead of a roomba. That was a mistake. After having this robot about a month the main sensor went out. I returned it through amazon and was issued another one. Three months went by and the same sensor issue happens. I called ecovac's customer service team and they issued me a new one. The most recent one worked as expected for over 8 months and did a good job. Then out of the blue the main brush quit working. I called customer service but my 1 year warranty (on the FIRST vacuum) had expired 12 days before the issue happened on the 8 month old vacuum, there was "nothing they could do".
customer_reviews.author: DDierking

customer_reviews.title: Great helper
customer_reviews.text: My hair is everywhere in my apartment. The robotic vacuum cleaner is much more convenient. I won’t bend my waist every day. I use it every few days. The sound is almost as big as the hair dryer. My cat saw it that was little fear at first, but now the cat faces it that is calm and very happy to be a supervisor. Every morning and evening, I can clean up a lot of cat hair, and the cabinet can also enter under the cabinet. The bathroom has a small step and can enter and exit freely, which is especially convenient. OK, I am quite satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: At first....LOVED IT. After about two weeks, it started having difficulty with conecting with the WiFi. Keeps saying it was offline and we couldn’t figure out how to reconnect it. Also, the charging port moves to an angle that we have to straighten before the vacuum can go straight back into it and recharge. So, it’s something we should send back because it doesn’t work the right way but the window to return is only a month! It should be 2 to 3 months for something this big of a purchase. Extremely dissatisfied with product.
customer_reviews.author: brandon j darrough

customer_reviews.title: Read the specifications!
customer_reviews.text: If you have 5G, it will not work. I was told the company was working on getting it upgraded but what good is it if I can't use it?!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sakaida

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't suck really well...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't suck really well and It fills up the basket/reserve really quick, In the hour it takes to vacuum, my 1100 sf house I can sweep it in 15 min, and I have to pause it to empty the catch basin every 5-10 min... granted we live on a dirt road and have hoses n dogs BUT for the price we paid for this vacuum, I shouldn't have to empty it out so often... out also losses the map every time I ask it to start up, I've tried everything techie that I can think of.... I think it would work great, if I didn't have animals, or lived in the dirt... unfortunately...
customer_reviews.author: onehotcowgirl2

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 2 months
customer_reviews.text: It was a great robot vacuum while it worked. I bought it in late November and it was working perfectly until January. My floors were clean and the mapping app with virtual barriers was awesome. 2 month later after finishing cleaning the robot went to the base like always but never recharge the battery. I tried everything that the manual said and nothing happened. Luckily I still had the amazon return window so I got my money back. Now I decided to buy a Roomba let’s see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Epanadas05

customer_reviews.title: Won’t connect to the network
customer_reviews.text: Well so far the thing won’t connect to my home network and is completely unusable so I’ll try to work with Tech Support but it’s ridiculous that it has to be this complicated. UPDATE: went through tech, turned off 5g on the router. rebooted everything. still doesn't work. BEWARE: the app may not work. I AM RETURNING THIS PRODUCT. SO DISAPPOINTING
customer_reviews.author: noel anschutz

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned my hardwood floor home with small area rug without trying to kill the furniture. When it couldn't get up on my small carpet, it went a different way and cleaned it too. Not too great on carpeting but terrific on floors. Don't know about battery life I've only had it a short time. It does a great job and is better than my Neeto and way better than my Dibea both of them traveled wherever they wanted and sometimes missed areas because of their random pattern
customer_reviews.author: MistyMom

customer_reviews.title: Better than costco one
customer_reviews.text: I bought one from Costco, it was really good. It was cleaned randomly, some area is clean some are not, one thing I hated very much was it got stop/ stock easily, we have to manually move it most of time and if the robot is around the charging station, it will just return even you just started, overall, it is not functionable and cleanable. I totally give up. my mom bought the Deebot and she really like it, so I bought one too, it has S shape cleaning function, and anti shock also multiple functions that works really good and cleans deeper, sucks bigger piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Katie D.

customer_reviews.title: Smart cleaning robot you should have!!
customer_reviews.text: I literally love this robot. We have been using for a week now, we schedule 7pm every night. Deebot starts automatically on time and cleans the floor well. The visual map got generated after using for the first time, we got surprised because the map is so accurate. The instruction is easy to read and the robot is easy to set up, I saw people put comments saying that they couldn’t pair the phone with the robot. But mine are super easy and quick to pair and the app is easy to use too. So far I will give 5 stars for this robot!
customer_reviews.author: Happydrackson

customer_reviews.title: Battery Died
customer_reviews.text: Had the vacuum for less than a year when the battery died. Ecovacs customer service basically had us run through some trouble shooting options. When nothing worked they basically broke off communication. The suction power was just okay. The mapping was average and needed to be reset pretty frequently. I probably would not purchase this product again. Will most likely go with the iRobot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding features at a low price point.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Deebot 901 I’ve purchased. Setup was easy (unlike many who complain you have to understand you can only connect to a 2G (5G will not work and I have not seen a router that doesn’t has at least one 2G band) wireless network and you have to have your phone on the same 2G network when you are setting up the vac). I love the continuous clean function (which negates any real concerns of limited battery life), do not disturb function and the real time tracking map. This vacuum has features that you only find in much more expensive robot vacuums. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Don T.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't charge
customer_reviews.text: I received my deebot 901. It was partially charged. So I was able to start cleaning right away. But once battery died I wasn't able to recharge. I tried multiple different things. Turning it on and off. Taking it off the charging dock as instructed in the manual. So I called ecovacs customer service.... after an hour of talking with a guy and my deebot taken apart and put back together.... still no luck. So then I was told to call amazon to get a replacement.... my new deebot 901 will be here tomorrow. Hoping this one charges
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Baran

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY. Buggy Software. Totally Unusable After 2 months
customer_reviews.text: After a handful of cycles, an automatic firmware update just completely destroyed the device and customer service has absolutely no idea what to do and Amazon is no longer accepting a return. Will never buy a device from ECOVACS again. STAY AWAY.
customer_reviews.author: DIYer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum was absolutely horrible! We had it for about a week and I don’t think it cleaned an entire way through without getting either just stopping or going back to the charger because it didn’t have enough battery life. The area it was to clean was only about 1000 square feet, hardwood with a couple short rugs and absolutely NO clutter to navigate. It had difficulty going into very low rugs, sometimes it’s wheel would just bump into the lip of the rug and turn around to go the opposite way. I don’t see how this thing is worth the money at all! Go buy a Roborock! They’re cheaper and at least clean an entire way through.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Evans

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as intended
customer_reviews.text: The suction and battery life is great for this item but that's where it stop. The unit does not save the full map. It does not return to continue where it left off. It moves the charge port around to different location in the app then than where it's actually located so it gets lost. The part of the map it save it tries to vacuum and Cal's it a new area so the map gets all jacked up. Return it since it does nothing it's stated to do.
customer_reviews.author: kakarat123

customer_reviews.title: Great robovac for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum for the money. The A.I. is a little goofy, it will clean some area 2x and miss other areas, the way it goes about cleaning doesnt seem efficient. Example, it will start in the kitchen, then decide to go to a back bedroom, then come back and clean the living room. All in all, great bang for the buck. I would buy another if I needed it. It self maps the house and you can tell it what to clean in the app, say you just want the living room done, it will do that and return to base.
customer_reviews.author: Sean McNair

customer_reviews.title: Keeping it for now
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Show map of the current floor it’s cleaning Resumes cleaning to finish the job App shows the paths it has taken Doesn’t randomly go around the house like crazy, creates zones and then up and down the zone Avoid certain areas Clean certain areas Cons: Doesn’t save maps of each floor May not map rooms of an open floor plan Google home integration is pretty lame (Start/Stop). No functions like "Clean a specific room" Edit: I have removed this pt. (Keeps losing WiFi connection) from the list of cons. I moved the base charging station closer to the WiFi router more in line of sight and its pretty stable as of now since a week.
customer_reviews.author: Satya Bhaskar Kolachana

customer_reviews.title: Product is not New and Ecovacs Robotics will not provide warranty
customer_reviews.text: We received the product and it came in a box that was already scratched. Opened the box to check the inside, only to find that there are light scratch marks on the top of the product and the brushes seem slightly used. The advertisement for this product indicate "new" which is misleading. Furthermore, called the Ecovacs Robotics and asked about the Warranty. Upon checking, they said that this is not one of their authorized seller therefore they will not provide warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Fernandes

customer_reviews.title: Like most people, good until the circles issue and going backward
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is great I have another one which i bought earlier about a 1year and 6 months ago that one still works. I got a new one for my soon to comepleted upstairs area so i didnt use it. After using it for just two months... Bam didnt work circles backward. Im not the type to complain on reviews so i opened it up tried cleaning it checking the connecters and suddenly it was working again. 5 minutes later it was the same issue. Kinda sad as i paid a lot and trusted it. I recommended it to a few people they didnt have issues. Lucky me i guess.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery
customer_reviews.text: Had the vacuum about 2 weeks and it worked pretty well. It would get stuck sometimes but it cleaned good. After 2 weeks it wouldn't charge anymore. I read other reviews and it seems they have the same issues with the charging. I really liked the map feature, but they need to improve on the battery and give it more clearance where it doesn't get stuck so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: First month is good... but down hill after that
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in Sept 2019 and right out of the box I had several issues doing the initial setup, but after about an hour everything linked up. The machine cleaned great for about a month, then it kept getting stuck in places and then it would just stop in the middle of the floor saying it was stuck? It still runs every day, but some days it cleans the whole house and other days your lucky if it cleans 1 room. It’s set to run while I’m at work, so you can’t even start it up again when I get home as the battery is usually dead or almost dead from just setting there all day off he charger.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great, and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly easy. Unbox, pull off protective films, snap on the brushes and plug in the charging dock. Connect the app on your phone following very simple instructions, and turn it on. It starts up and goes to the charging station automatically. Got to cleaning right away. How simple!! We watched it roll over some dirt and hair and it picked 90% of it up first pass.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Terrible for pet hair.
customer_reviews.text: We have two dogs. One who sheds endless 2” length hair. The opening on the bin of this vacuum is too small and it just clogs up with hair while the bin stays empty. The app doesn’t stay connected and the maps don’t save. I wish I would have realized how much I hate this vacuum during the return period.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Software does not work
customer_reviews.text: It had Ecovac before and was happy with it. Bought this 901 version because of the mapping and virtual wall feature, but none is working for me. The map kept resetting and the wall was impossible to set. Returning to docking station did not seem to work either. Going to return it
customer_reviews.author: DongD

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Bot!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool thing to have at the house... it kind of scares yea with the stuff it picks up in just one pass. It does have issues now and then getting around small confined areas. Also, I have found that it doesn't play well with bathroom rugs. Sometimes it is not a problem, but other times it is... so solution is to just pick them up on the days of vac ops. I suggest this especially for the price for anyone thinking about getting a vacuum bot.
customer_reviews.author: Deb B.

customer_reviews.title: Keep moving, nothing to see here
customer_reviews.text: I personally don'r recommend this model. We bought it less than a year ago, Dec 2018, and already looking for its replacement. Dust bin is small, now it stops everywhere without any obstruction. Getting a map for the entire house is nearly impossible (1800 sqft). We plan going back to the tank-like minded neato, now it has the navigation app we wanted and it is priced down to earth.
customer_reviews.author: Zek

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum has a mind of its own!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum lives up to the price. The first one we received we had to send back because it was defective and never charged properly. The second one we thought was going to workout but it would lose its map of the cleaning space every other day and go to areas that were set as boundaries not to clean therefor getting stuck and not finishing a clean cycle. After several tries, we decided to give up and go with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: Poor product, poor customer relations.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes based on reviews. In the 14 mo since purchasing a DEEBOT 900, the unit has failed to charge after a month or so of use. ECOVACS replaced the first 3 failed units but now refuses to offer any assistance—even my request for credit toward my purchasing an upgraded model. Poor product and poor customer relations policy. I’ll be using another company—suggest you do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than 5 months with light to moderate use. Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: It broke in less than 5 month of light to moderate use. Now it just spins in place and I have tried all of the suggested options to restart it. It only vaccums the bare floor area and one 5 by 7 short pile area rug. I even made sure the rug was a very short pile because I didn’t want it to break it. Window of return is now passed. Don’t waste your money on this item.
customer_reviews.author: H.F

customer_reviews.title: Perfect item
customer_reviews.text: This is the first smart vacuum we use and I love it. 1), it is pretty easy to install. Just take 3 steps. 2), it can draw a map of my home, so that to avoid unnecessary contact. 3), it do know how to clean the house and when to charge itself. Overall, it set me free from cleaning. The only problem is my 2-year old is a little bit scared by it. But she will get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Liang

customer_reviews.title: Only works on carpet 1/4" or less, will damage and/or not work on anything longer
customer_reviews.text: This was tearing up my carpets on the occasions when it did work. Message from support: "The Deebot 900 is built for hard surfaces and short pile carpet only (1/4")." If you have carpet longer than 1/4", DO NOT BUY This thing would either just spin in place or tear chunks out of the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew William

customer_reviews.title: I didn't listen to the reviews but this is more problems than it's worth
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this robot cleaner. It does not stay connected to wifi. It connected once and no matter how many times I try to trouble shoot the robot, it will not reconnect. The front wheel fell off and now we cannot get it back on or get a replacement that will reconnect. The bin is tiny and pet hair does not get sucked up. Overall it had potential and even cleans ok but it is just more trouble than it is worth.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Lepore

customer_reviews.title: Average build, short battery life, smart navigation was a plus
customer_reviews.text: Would not connect to my fancy gaming router, so I had to buy a cheapo router and setup a 2nd wireless network. Tech support could not find the issue and passed me off to 6 different people. That was annoying. Battery consistently lasts 60-65 minutes which is a let down. But the software kinda makes up for it by allowing the vac to pick up where it left off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks! I mean that in a good way. It's laser mapping and navigation is impressive. I bought this shortly after I moved into a new house and had boxes everywhere, it dealt with all of it. One day I was hanging pictures in a room it was cleaning and I moved my stepladder like 4 times around the room and everytime it encountered it, it navigated in and around it without missing a beat. Highly recommend this. No problems with thresholds or area rugs. It does a good cleaning job and the bin actually holds a surprising amount.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Seely

customer_reviews.title: very helpful product
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 kids, it means I need to clean up everyday, and at least I have to spend one of my days off to vacuum whole house. When I decide to buy a vacuum cleaner, some of our friends recommend Deebot 901 to us. It is smart and very helpful. It comes with an App, you can setup what you want it to do, when it works on which floor or room. It is not noisy, we can talk normally, but not recommend it works while sleep or read book. For me, it is easy to setup and use it. It works great for what I expect. Love it, save my time. save my life.
customer_reviews.author: asily

customer_reviews.title: excellent vaccum
customer_reviews.text: I am really satisfied with this vacuum robot. 1. its really easy to use. use to setup, connect to app, and easy to clean. 2. the vaccum can move smoothly, work well on both floor and rug. 3. compared with my previous vaccum, deebot can do the cleanning quietly. 4. my favorite part is that you can choose a suction option. because i have pet in hoise, i choose the direct suction option. it works good and it is designed to pick up hair without getting clogged.
customer_reviews.author: jupiter88

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this vacuum. The mapping function is very nice and pretty accurate. The machine runs smoothly and is not very loud at all. The suction power works great, and is transitions smoothly from carpet to tile and vice versa. The battery life is not as long as I would have hoped for, but when it goes to recharge, it completes the rest of the cleaning cycle it missed before the battery was low. That is a nice feature, opposed to having to start all over, it knows where it left off and completes the cleaning. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Changing my reviw. Was 5 stars now 1. Machine worked great for about 6 months. Would expect it to lost longer for the price. Even with all the cleaning and matenence I can do to it it still stops after 10 minutes and insists to "help me out" and won't continue cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Eighty.

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: It was neat to watch the Deebot map out the house. Had to go back in and set up boundaries because it loves shoe strings. The only disadvantage I have found is if you leave a door open that was originally not part of the mapping, it will enter that space and try to vacuum it. It does do a great job in the areas it is supposed to clean
customer_reviews.author: CD1967

customer_reviews.title: Warranty replacement with an older version
customer_reviews.text: I liked the 901 and the map on the ap helped me see what areas had been cleaned and what areas needed it. It quit working after less than 2 months and we spent a lot of time on the phone with techs and tried everything and finally they replaced it-with a different older model without the memory map so now I have no idea if it finished a room unless I sweep it! Which defeats the purpose in having a helper right. I wish I had a replacement comparable to the one I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: hollie newsome

customer_reviews.title: Won't work without giving IMEI and storage access to your phone
customer_reviews.text: I have previously purchased three Ecovac 900 for my rental homes. This latest Ecovac however is incompatible with their earlier android app. The new vac forces you to use their new app that requires access to your phone's IMEI and device storage. Sorry Ecovacs, not giving you access to my phone just to use your new vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job well
customer_reviews.text: Set this to run at night. weaves it's way around chair legs, slows down near objects and doesn't slam into things. Catches all our rabbit hairs and dust/dirt you didn't see or know you had. Initially, would clean the entire first floor but had a little trouble with making it over the threshold to the kitchen and now does not clean that room. It is simple to use and program and does it's job well. I only wish I could use it on different levels and not exclusively on the floor it maps out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very intelligent vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I received this vacuum and waited a month to write this review. This is a super smart vacuum. It does not get stuck anywhere. This vacuum glides on any surface with a very smooth transition. So far I like this better than the Irobot. Also the App works very well with the vacuum, it maps out my house and shows the vacuum track. There is a setting for invisible walls, I use it around my Christmas tree. Overall, I am very satisified with this product.
customer_reviews.author: R.J

customer_reviews.title: Very good robot!
customer_reviews.text: Very good vacuum. Have had several robot vacs and this is by far the best so far! Love the mapping capability and the ability to creat a virtual area that you don’t want the vacuum to enter. I use that feature to keep the robot off a very high pile rug that I don’t want it to try to clean. I love this little robot! Note: it is no super quiet.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: When sucks is a good thing :)
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love ECOVACS products! Cleans very well. The mapping is was a little challenging. Third time was the charm! Got stuck a few times and had to start over. Cleaned my girls rooms which was good and bad. Good, cause now they’re clean. Bad, cause it took me a half hour to get the hair out of the main brush. I would recommend this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: MJH

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for price.
customer_reviews.text: If you are going to buy a robot vacuum spend the extra money for smart navigation. The biggest pro can also be a con while mapping. You have to get a map before you can edit it. On the mapping it fit into an area I didnt think it would fit. I grabbed it and moved it but I restarting it remembered where it left off. It went right back. I would advise on the initial mapping run to not install the sweeping brushs and to take the roller out. It won't suck up cords.
customer_reviews.author: larry bagley

customer_reviews.title: Should have got the roomba s9+ to begin with
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: battery wont hold a charge anymore got online and the battery isn’t available for this model anymore. Just got the room a s9+ and all I can say is I should have got it to begin with. I have had this since last December and it has worked flawless. And then the 2.1.3 firmware update and it can’t find the base, it starts to rebuild the map and after doing half the house the map starts to get crooked and where the debit actually is and where it shows on the map are not the same. If they don’t get this fixed very soon I will be switching brands. Because as of right now it is not usable.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good when it works
customer_reviews.text: Love the product if it works. It refuses to charge and I’ve missed my return window. Lame
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 months and we are hoping for a return
customer_reviews.text: We have had this vacuum for approximately 2 months and it is no longer working. When it worked we were very pleased but it would lose its map almost daily, forcing me to recreate the No Go Zones. Now it does not have any suction. We are just outside of our return window and hoping the company will step up and replace this thing
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had my eye on this for a while, I switched from an ilife unit to this and it's been wonderful. My floor layout is complicated and this handles it like a champ. My floor has random separator raises between rooms, pillars and areas that have narrow one way entrances. The ilife would routinely get trapped under couches or on those partitions I mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Walton

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I've been debating getting a robovac for a while, and got this on a Gold Box deal. This vacuum works surprisingly well, and was easy to set up. The mapping feature works pretty well, and it cleans well underneath tables and around chairs. Occasionally it struggles with the transition from hardwood to carpet, but generally does pretty well. "Smart" features are definitely a plus--I especially like that if the battery gets low during cleaning, it will automatically recharge and then resume cleaning in the same spot it left off. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nick S

customer_reviews.title: Great little bot
customer_reviews.text: We love our “Jim-bob-scooter”. Set up a schedule to clean three times a week. Keeps the place nice and tidy all week long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great so far. I love how it maps the house and tells what it cleans, recharges, and goes back to cleaning all on its own. It’s also nice that you can block off areas of the house you don’t want it to go. Overall good product so far but I’ve only been using it a week
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Daley

customer_reviews.title: Great Little thing
customer_reviews.text: Great, does great with pet hair. Need to empty after each use but does great. Love seeing the path it takes each time. It can get caught up on rugs that are high on wood floor.
customer_reviews.author: Talia D.

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with 5Ghz Wifi
customer_reviews.text: Important, if you have a tech heavy home. The App and the Vacuum only operate on a 2.4Ghz wi-fi network. I had to setup a separate just for the device.
customer_reviews.author: Chris A.

customer_reviews.title: Will not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Great smart vacuum I search all of amazon looking for the right one there are so many to choose from I wanted one that did not just bounce off walls but actually plotted where it was going to go this vacuum has not disappointed I had a little trouble with the boundary setting at first but after a little adjustment it recognizes them and it is great to bot have to actually place a physical boundary or magnetic strip
customer_reviews.author: Terrell Cole

customer_reviews.title: It died.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fairly well while it lasted. For what ever reason, it got stuck one day. Instead of giving up and requesting assistance, it appears to have kept pushing on the new shelf we got and stripped out its drive wheels. Now it tries to move, but makes weird snapping noises and shakes like its having a seizure.
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: Navigation / resume clean is a must for larger areas
customer_reviews.text: Runs the whole house first time and creates a floor map which lets you select specific areas for future cleaning Resume clean is a must feature for larger areas Really good job navigating around furniture / walls/ doors and onto rugs Floor/rug is clean, and especially around corners App lets you schedule cleaning, select specific area, create virtual boundaries Bin easy to empty / clean
customer_reviews.author: OJ DIY 2012

customer_reviews.title: Software controling the vacuum is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed having this robot vacuum until recently when it disconnected from our network, and after spending several hours looking online for help and trying to change different settings on my router, and on my iphone, I'm still not able to get it reconnected. I've talked to their tech support before and totally unhappy with how much help I received. Something is really wrong with their software and they seem unwilling to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: great product for the price - awesome navigation
customer_reviews.text: low profile, goes under low furniture. Super smart navigation. i have a full container of debris every day....didnt know how dirty my house got.
customer_reviews.author: O Fonseca

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. I wish I would’ve returned it during my return window. Gets stuck all the time, can’t find its way back to the charger, continuously bumps into the same exact spot 10 times before maybe trying A different direction. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: D. Cullina

customer_reviews.title: Good bot servant
customer_reviews.text: Two months in enjoy the bot doing the work. Works great on carpets. Took a while for AI to map the house, but custom maps function works well. Battery doesn’t have enough juice to do whole floor without recharging. WiFi signal drops when behind chimney on far side of the house and bot gets lost.
customer_reviews.author: Franchise

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant,love it. Initial Quality and capability is awesome. We have the robot clean one time. It is remarkable for the amount of dirt and hair it sweeps up from carpeted rooms and hard floors. It is really good at navigating itself through the house, under some furniture, various rooms and cleans effectively. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: The app has improved
customer_reviews.text: This is a good vacuum I suppose, as it's my first robot vac. Does a pretty good job cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Es

customer_reviews.title: Broken product.
customer_reviews.text: It started out as a fine product. I have a small apartment and it was able to map perfectly and the app allows you block off areas. Until recently the robot has become unable to find it's way back to the charging dock. If you pick up the robot to help it out, you have to reset the map. It's been very annoying. See video >>
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Garbage product.  Garbage support.  Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTE GARBAGE. The 901 would not connect to my Wi-fi and their tech support (not US based) had me perform a rain-dance of steps to rectify the problem -- none of which worked. Then, they suggested that I could ship the unit back to them for repair or replacement. Mind you, I had it in my possession for no more than two hours. NO THANK YOU. I returned to Amazon for a refund without a problem. I advise the consumer to look elsewhere for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Philip K

customer_reviews.title: Works great but included instructions for initial set up and use need work
customer_reviews.text: After you master the set-up and use of the app, it works well. Very good at cleaning, better than expected, but dust bin is smallish, requiring frequent emptying. Mapping feature is main reason we selected Deebot901, works great except the app no longer tracks the robot's position in the house while cleaning. This our first robot vac and we like the Deebot. There are a few bugs, but overall the unit is fine.
customer_reviews.author: beach bum

customer_reviews.title: I do NOT recommend this
customer_reviews.text: Battery is always low. When I assume it’s full and ready to clean, I hear “battery is low” and I want to throw this in the garbage. App is terrible. I do NOT recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alan christiani

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 days!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for me and one for my daughter. Mine worked great for 3 days and then kept giving me error message after error message and then it finally just completely stopped working. The company is sending a replacement but after all the reviews I am reading I don’t have much hope for the replacement now either. Should have read these reviews first because I definitely would not have bought one let alone two!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cannot connect to anything except 2.4 G wifi. My wifi is 5.0 G so the app is useless. After using the vacuum once it stopped working and would not return to the docking station. After placing it manually into the docking station it would not charge. It also picked up almost nothing from the floors that it did "clean." I'm returning this oversized paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce H.

customer_reviews.title: App doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the features of the app and program-ability. Couldn't get the app to work and connect to the network and robot. Very difficult to follow instructions. Never actually got the vacuum to operate as it couldn't be connected to the app. There's too many other options to fight with software. Returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoPilot

customer_reviews.title: Bad WiFi, Bad Buy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this now for two years. I was excited at first by how easy it was to use the map on the app to draw no go lines. Then, I realized the tech issues were never ending. It doesn’t stay connected to my app. I have to constantly go through the setup to connect it over and over. Hunk of junk.
customer_reviews.author: NickP

customer_reviews.title: MAPPING is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: Almost Perfect! Don't settle for a NON-mapping model when you can have this for less money than the other brands. App was a little quirky setting up bit after that this thing is great!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Buckner

customer_reviews.title: She definitely gets the dirt and hair. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I've ever made for the house wife loves it. I have stained concrete floors two kids small dog and cat. She runs twice a week cant really schedule her cause kids and animals we have to straighten up behind so she's able to make a good pass through the house. I'm starting to think she creates dirt and hair cause everytime she runs I have to dump her bin Haha. Just kidding it's the kids and country livin. Awesome addition to the house floors have never been cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Walton

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Dog hair clogs up the tiny bin quickly. Mapping resets almost everytime so you lose the boundaries that are blocked off.
customer_reviews.author: Larebel

customer_reviews.title: pick up everything when it maps the first time
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Set it on continuous clean to map. When the battery needs to be charged before it's done mapping/cleaning everything, it will return to the dock and when it's done recharging it will pick up where it left off. I picked everything up off the floor for the initial mapping so it would always try and clean those places. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for Roomba
customer_reviews.text: Much better than Roomba. Returns to charging station as designed. Roomba would never return or get stuck on something and need assistance.
customer_reviews.author: technerd

customer_reviews.title: Much careful to buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought Deebot 900 series on Sep 8,2019. They gave warranty for 1 year. So this vacuum is good for only 1 year. Mine broke on 9/16/2020. after exactly 1 year. This product is $500 almost and I do not think it is a good idea to invest 500 on something which will work only 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: Jamil

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: OMG this is the greatest vacuum robot ever it works so well around my house
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W Reidenbach

customer_reviews.title: Poor Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: You sell me a defective item and then state i have to pay to have to send back and pay 20% restocking fee. I cont acted the manufacturer and they are taking care of this situation.
customer_reviews.author: Robert-Christina Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for a couple months then broke down
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Broke after a couple months and support is almost impossible to communicate with.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Works well and cleans great. Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to this version of a Deebot. First model worked very well, but it lacked the laser and diagram making that this one has. We are very pleased with every aspect of this version. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Heliguy2

customer_reviews.title: Black rugs or carpets? Dont buy it
customer_reviews.text: Loved it at first. Since vac wont work on any black carpets I had to setup no go areas. Yet it still goes in those areas. No way to turn off anti drop sensor to fix issue even with having a single story home.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Save time
customer_reviews.text: I am a busy mom between work and home, and I never have enough time to sweep the floor everyday. Now that I bought ecovacs deebot 901 Robotic vacuum this it saves a lot of my time.It cleans my floor pretty well. I like how you can control it with your phone. I am really happy that I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: daisy yang

customer_reviews.title: Like my Deebot
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little robot vacuum! Keeps my floors looking great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good. But no 5 GHz?
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Would have given 5 star if it wasn't a pain to set up. No 5 GHz wifi supported. Had to create a whole new 2.4 GHz wifi just for the vac
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Internet access poor
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like it’s performance. It doesn’t stay online long enough to charge properly. It has tried to clean a few times but doesn’t last long enough to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: WOW, Got my DEEBOT 901 delivered, unboxed and downloaded the app got it connected to my wireless network and let it do it’s thing. This thing is amazing, had no problem going from hardwood to floor rug or carpet. Even on the standard suction it had no problem picking up dirt and let hair. I give it a huge 👍’s up.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Battery died after two months
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this robot and used it all the time. However, the battery refused to hold a charge after a few months. After contacting Amazon support and then the deebot company I have sent a replacement robot in white. Hopefully this new one will last longer!
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life and navigation.
customer_reviews.text: Very short battery life and with poor navigation I’ve had to pick it off the floor and bring it back to the charging station about 50% of the time. Charge connector is poorly designed so you’d have to double and triple check if you manually move it back to the charger. Wish I checked the order date so I could return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a terrible product and tecnical support is not knowledgeable
customer_reviews.text: The worse product I have purchased in a long time. Never got it to be connected to my WiFi, even with the help of Tecnical support. I’m returning it. Don’t buy it. Read the reviews
customer_reviews.author: Claudio martins

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good suction!
customer_reviews.text: I had this product for a couple of weeks now and so far it seems pretty good, suction is really good.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: A great product at a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: It provides great ear protection at the shooting range and is comfortable to wear for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Al Lijewski

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: It keeps circling the same area. I thought maybe it was more dirty than other areas so, I cleaned it manually; the same result. It now just sits in the box. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Strachon

customer_reviews.title: 👎
customer_reviews.text: Had a very hard time getting the system to connect to my phone
customer_reviews.author: David Scurti

customer_reviews.title: Great to clean all the house!
customer_reviews.text: By far I have loving my deebot 901 so much! Its an incredible helper to clean all the rooms, I'm very impressed by the fact how it suction all the dust in every room of my house! The only thing I don't like is that I would like to buy the replacement of the brush but I cannot find it anywhere :(
customer_reviews.author: melymontufar

product_meta.title: Ecovacs Deebot 901 Robotic Vacuum Cleaner with Smart Navi 3.0
product_meta.description: Customer should connect Wi-Fi to 2.4g. Customer should try mapping a smaller area first to ensure products maps successfully.
feature_bullets: Easy to navigate - This technology enables the DEEBOT to skillfully navigate and map your floor plan in real-time. The map is interactive allowing freedom to customize.
Easy to use - You can start, stop, or charge your DEEBOT with Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, or mobile device via the ECOVACS app.
Easy for deeper cleanings - DEEBOT has interchangeable suction plates to master carpet and hard floor cleaning. It also has edge and spot mode to concentrate on specific areas.
Easy to update - Over The AIR (OTA) means DEEBOT will automatically install updates via Wi-Fi. Also, DEEBOT informs you on its progress with real-time voice reporting.
Note: Customer should connect Wi-Fi to 2.4g. Customer should try mapping a smaller area first to ensure products maps successfully.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars503 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
